name: Orizon Aviation
about: Orizon Aviation, certified by Transport Canada since 2004, is a reputable flight training unit based at CYQB. We offer a variety of training programs, including Private Pilot Licence (PPL), Night Rating, and Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL). Our experienced instructors provide comprehensive training to ensure students meet the highest standards of aviation safety and proficiency. With a focus on advancing transportation safety, Orizon Aviation is committed to delivering top-notch education and training, preparing students for successful careers in aviation. We are dedicated to helping our students achieve their flying goals in a safe and professional environment.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Instrument Rating (IR)
Multi-Engine Rating"]
